title: Quiz
content:
Chapter Quiz

Answer the following questions to check your understanding of this chapter's topics.

questions.question: In the context of 'Advanced Layouts', which statement about building dashboards that scale is most accurate?
choices: Building Dashboards that Scale always requires external services to work in Streamlit.
Building Dashboards that Scale is useful in some cases, but you should evaluate complexity and UX trade-offs.
Building Dashboards that Scale is deprecated and should be avoided in all Streamlit apps.
Building Dashboards that Scale only works when running Streamlit in Docker.
questions.explanation: Building Dashboards that Scale is a powerful pattern, but like most advanced techniques, it should be used judiciously with attention to user impact and maintainability.
